description: A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

SmallML is a three-layer Bayesian framework that enables small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to build production-grade machine learning models despite having limited customer data.
Machine learning framework for predicting enthalpy of vaporization of liquid cooling materials

A Machine Learning web application that predicts the occurrence or intensity of forest fires based on the Algerian Forest Fires Dataset. This project utilizes a Ridge Regression model and is deployed using a Flask web framework.
The R code for A scalable Bayesian double machine learning framework for high dimensional causal estimation, with application to racial disproportionality assessment

Machine learning models for predicting postoperative delirium from perioperative EHR data, including baseline models, domain-structured ensembles, interpretability, calibration, and decision curve analysis.

FRIF Sentinel is a fraud detection framework combining machine learning and graph analytics to uncover organized fraud rings. It models temporal and network relationships among cards, merchants, and devices, prioritizes interventions, and forecasts financial impactreducing false positives and improving detection efficiency.

An intelligent electrical fault diagnosis framework integrating machine learning and generative AI for fault classification, root-cause analysis, and corrective action recommendation in power distribution systems.
for Manuscript: Open-Source Machine-Learning Framework for Predicting PD-L1 Inhibitory Potency Using Curated Bioactivity Data and Molecular Fingerprints
A repository focused on implementing machine learning frameworks and statistical methods to predict the closing price of a stock
OpenCircuitDesigner (a work in progress) is a simple Python framework for prototyping  EDA (Electronic Design Automation) + ML (Machine Learning) workflows specific to OLED pixel circuit design.
Quantum Machine Learning for Emotion Detection: A Hybrid QNN Framework

A multifaceted framework for analysing, modeling, and managing credit risk, combining data engineering, statistical modeling, decision logic, and machine learning to support accurate risk assessment, monitoring, and smarter lending strategies

A profit-oriented churn prediction and decision framework using machine learning.
Incubation is a high-throughput realistic synthetic data generator designed to stress-test machine learning pipelines, recommenders, and clustering models across any ML framework.
A machine learning framework to predict loan default risk using alternative borrower data, designed for underserved financial segments.

Codebase for an XGBoost machine-learning framework applied to biomass estimation. The repository provides preprocessing routines, model training and tuning scripts, performance evaluation, and reproducible workflows supporting the published study.

This repository contains hands-on projects in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI, focusing on real-world datasets, model building, evaluation, and experimentation using Python and popular ML/DL frameworks.
An open-source machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions.

This project implements an emotion and context-aware recommendation system that enhances traditional recommendation approaches by incorporating user emotions and situational context. Using a hybrid machine learning framework, the system adapts recommendations dynamically to deliver more relevant, personalized, and human-centric suggestions.

Validation-driven machine learning framework where scientific constraints act as adaptive validators rather than fixed physics losses. Demonstrated on a climate downscaling example to contrast against PINN-style constraint enforcement
An extensible framework for reproducible machine learning experiments

An AI-powered ETL testing framework that combines rule-based validation, statistical analysis, machine learning, and advanced AI techniques to help teams catch data quality issues early, surface potential regulatory risks (AML, structuring, sanctions patterns), and produce actionable reports for engineers, analysts, and compliance reviewers.
DistroML is an enterprise-grade distributed machine learning training framework designed to accelerate deep learning workflows across multiple GPUs, nodes, and cloud environments.

This project develops and critically evaluates a machine learning framework for improved prediction of human thermal sensation
Collection of machine learning projects spanning healthcare prediction, business analytics, and NLP - built with Python, scikit-learn, and deep learning frameworks.
We are living in a decade where AI is evolving faster than our ethical frameworks. This repository aims to explore and evaluate machine learning models through the lens of fairness and bias

Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.

A .NET Core application for house price prediction using machine learning.  Built with ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core, and ML.NET.  Features RESTful API, data validation, and comprehensive testing.

The project addresses these concerns by developing a framework for bias detection and mitigation, primarily through data preprocessing. Traditional preprocessing techniques often  favor majority classes while discarding minority instances, leading to skewed model behavior.

Companion repository for the paper Threat-Driven Frameworks for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Practitioners Guide (20172025). Contains benchmarking tables, framework metrics, figure sources, and reference summaries for privacy-preserving ML techniques.
This repository seeks to leverage machine learning frameworks to tackle Valley Fever disease. Goal is to identify compounds that inhibit the disease.

Project Showcase is a collection of data science and analytics projects that highlight skills in data cleaning, exploration, visualization, and modeling. Each project demonstrates the ability to extract insights from complex datasets using tools like Python, SQL, and machine learning frameworks.
A Python framework for machine learning experiments in industrial machinery fault diagnosis through vibration analysis.
The Career Guidance Framework is a system that recommends suitable career paths for students based on their skills, academic performance, and interests using a machine learning approach.

This project develops a hybrid, interpretable framework that integrates physics-based resistance-capacitance (RC) models with machine learning regression algorithms to predict indoor thermal dynamics in buildings. The workflow demonstrates how domain knowledge can be embedded within data-driven models to enhance interpretability and accuracy

End-to-end machine learning project for customer churn prediction using a telecom dataset. The solution includes data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, and model comparison. A cost-sensitive threshold optimization framework is applied to maximize churn recall and minimize business loss, demonstrating business-focused ML decision-making.

This project presents an AI-powered cybersecurity framework designed to protect critical infrastructure systems (such as energy, transportation, healthcare, and government networks) by combining threat intelligence, real-time attack detection, and digital forensics analysis.  The framework leverages machine learning and automated analytics

In this study, we introduce a novel machine learning based framework that predicts austenitic grain growth behaviour directly from chemical composition and process conditions, utilizing a comprehensive dataset of 1039 experimentally validated samples. Among various algorithms tested, the XGBoost model demonstrated exceptional predictive capability
A from-scratch implementation of linear regression using only NumPy. This project demonstrates the fundamentals of gradient descent optimization without relying on machine learning frameworks.

CircumSpectrum is a flux-based framework that converts bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data into metabolic fingerprints using genome-scale models and machine learning. It includes RADAR, SOURIS, and CORALIE modules for reaction-level, cross-cohort, and multi-tier correlation analyses.

A curated list of awesome frameworks, libraries, tools, tutorials, datasets, and research papers in machine learning. This list covers a wide array of topics, from foundational algorithms to modern techniques in supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
Official implementation of the framework for the paper: "Data-Augmented Machine Learning Validates Personalized Carbohydrate-Protein Supplement for Endurance Exercisers".

A graph-based machine learning framework for Aadhaar data analytics focused on regional coverage assessment, location-change anomaly detection, duplicate identity detection, and interactive dashboard visualization for governance and fraud prevention.
Polars-native automatic machine learning feature generation framework.

A curated list of awesome frameworks, libraries, tools, and resources for Artificial Intelligence (AI). This list covers everything from foundational machine learning and deep learning to specialized areas like NLP, computer vision, and AI ethics.

Experimental framework and Bayesian machine learning pipeline for estimating soil Volumetric Water Content (VWC) using passive UHF RFID technology. Includes physics-informed preprocessing, statistical modeling (Bayesian regression), and sensor data analysis for indirect sensing in smart agriculture and IoUT contexts.
A versatile local LLM framework for chat, image, video, machine learning modelling, speech, and automation

Pax is a Jax-based machine learning framework for training large scale models. Pax allows for advanced and fully configurable experimentation and parallelization, and has demonstrated industry leading model flop utilization rates.

This project implements a market-neutral quantitative equity trading model using daily price data from Indian large-cap stocks. The strategy combines multiple systematic alpha signalsmean reversion, momentum, statistical arbitrage, and machine learningwithin a longshort framework. Risk is controlled using volatility-based position sizing and ATR

An end-to-end machine learning research and experimentation framework for Forex market prediction, signal generation (BUY / SELL / HOLD), and performance evaluation using feature engineering, ensemble learning, and time-series modeling.

A collection of machine learning projects and experiments covering end-to-end ML pipelines, from model development to deployment. Focused on practical AI engineering, ML frameworks and MLOps practices.

flowMagic is an R package for automated bivariate gating of flow cytometry (FCM) data. It uses a machine-learning model trained on both experts data and a large, high-quality FCM dataset generated by EVE Online players. The package also provides an extensive visualization toolkit and integrates seamlessly with the flowCore/flowWorkspace frameworks

Explainable machine learning framework for detecting illicit activities across Bitcoin and Ethereum. Achieves F scores of 0.92-0.985 while maintaining full interpretability through SHAP, CIU and DEXiRE methods. GDPR and EU AI Act compliant. Built for fraud investigators, regulators and AML compliance teams.

Developed a prognostic framework leveraging machine learning algorithms for early and accurate prediction of multiple diseases. The model integrates patient health data and clinical parameters to enhance diagnostic precision and support preventive healthcare decisions.

BioGraphX is a comprehensive framework for extracting biophysical features from protein sequences using graph-theoretical approaches.
